message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product that I believe will be highly valuable to your business. I'm offering it to you for $1,150,000, which is a price point that I believe represents fair value for both of us. This product is worth $1,200,000 to you, so this offer allows you to make a significant profit. Please let me know your decision. If you decline, I'll be selling it to another buyer for $1,000,000.
